text: Moussa Traoré (25 September 1936 - 15 September 2020) was a Malian soldier and politician. He was the President of Mali from 1968 to 1991. As a Lieutenant, he was ousted on 19 November 1968 military coup by Modibo Keïta. Traoré died on 15 September 2020 in Bamako, aged 83.Mali: l'ancien président Moussa Traoré est mort == Further reading == * Pascal James Imperato. Traore, Gen. Moussa in Historical Dictionary of Mali, pp. 242–245. Scarecrow Press/ Metuchen. NJ – London (1986) * Moussa Traoré. (2008). In Encyclopædia Britannica. title: Moussa Traoré
